channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Take action by February 1: Azure AD Graph is retiring
item.description: Hey Folks, We wanted to get this news at the top of your inbox for 2025: Applications will be unable to make requests to Azure AD Graph APIs starting February 1, 2025. We're proceeding with the Retirement of the Azure AD Graph API service, which began in September 2024. Our next big milestone starts February 1st, when existing applications will be prevented from calling Azure AD Graph APIs. You may not see impact right away, as we’re rolling out this change in stages across tenants. We anticipate full deployment of this change by the end of February. Microsoft Graph is the replacement fo...
